Rulings.Edison:
● The ② effect can only negate cards, not effects. It can also only negate cards which target exactly 1 Psychic (and no other cards).
● The ② effect can negate cards which target Psychics anywhere, even in either GY.
Rulings.Tengu:
● The ② effect can only negate cards, not effects. It can also only negate cards which target exactly 1 Psychic (and no other cards).
● The ② effect can negate cards which target Psychics anywhere, even in either GY.

Rulings.Cat:
● You can chain 'Thought Ruler Archfiend's' effect when a Psychic in the GY is targeted.
● “Thought Ruler Archfiend’s” effect can be activated during the Damage Step.

● “Thought Ruler Archfiend’s” effect can be activated during the Damage Step.

Rulings.Base: 1. You can chain the effect of "Thought Ruler Archfiend" when a Psychic-Type monster in the GY is targeted.\n2. The effect of "Thought Ruler Archfiend" can be activated during the Damage Step.

PSCT.Edison:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
① If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: 
Gain LP equal to that monster's original ATK (even if it is no longer in the GY). 
② If a Spell/Trap Card is activated that targets 1 exactly Psychic (anywhere) (Quick): You can pay 1000LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
PSCT.Tengu:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
① If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: 
Gain LP equal to that monster's original ATK in the GY. 
② If a Spell/Trap Card is activated that targets 1 exactly Psychic (anywhere) (Quick): You can pay 1000LP;
negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

PSCT.Base:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Gain LP equal to that monster's original ATK in the Graveyard. During either player's turn, when a Spell/Trap Card is activated that targets exactly 1 Psychic-Type monster (and no other cards): You can pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
